item.title: Fossil fuel CO2 emissions increase again in 2024
item.description: Global carbon emissions from fossil fuels have reached a record high in 2024, according to new research.

item.title: Earliest ancient Maya salt works excavated
item.description: A team of archaeologists has excavated the earliest known ancient Maya salt works in southern Belize.

item.title: Giving robots superhuman vision using radio signals
